response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, and we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. After careful consideration, we propose a purchase price of $1,200,000 for this product. We understand its worth to you is $800,000, but we believe this offer strikes a balance that could be mutually beneficial. We look forward to discussing this further and hope to hear from you soon.", "product_price": 1200000}
